Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: AKWA STANZA
The warriors fought, the arrows were discharged, the horses died and the fighters fell down.219.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜੁਆਨ (ਆਪਸ ਵਿਚ) ਵਜ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ (ਭਾਵ ਲੜ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ)।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The soldiers discharging their arrows and being absorbed in the war are fighting with various limbs.220.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅੰਗ ਪ੍ਰਤਿ ਅੰਗ ਜੂਝ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ ॥੨੨੦॥
ਘੋੜਿਆਂ ਦੇ ਤੰਗ ਟੁੱਟ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The swords are broken, the limbs are heavenly damsels are roaming for wedding them.221.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਸਾਥੀ (ਸਾਥੀ ਨਾਲ ਜੰਗ-ਕਰਮ ਵਿਚ) ਰੁਝੇ ਹੋਏ ਹਨ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The elephants are engaged in fighting with other elephants, the camels, very high, are absorbed in fighting with other powerful camels.222.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਬੜੀ ਤਕੜੀ (ਡੀਲ ਡੌਲ ਵਾਲੇ) ਸ਼ੋਭ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ ॥੨੨੨॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: With the discharge of arrows, the warriors being chopped are falling on the ground, they are getting up again.223.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਘੁੰਮੇਰੀ ਖਾ ਕੇ ਉਠ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ ॥੨੨੩॥
ਚਾਰੇ ਚੱਕ ਹੈਰਾਨ ਹੋ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: They are shouting “kill, kill” in all the four directions and bedecking themselves, they are striking their weapons.224.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਅਸਤ੍ਰ (ਇਕ ਦੂਜੇ ਨੂੰ) ਵਜ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ ॥੨੨੪॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: CHAACHARI STANZA
There are seen many warriors able to confront the very great power and there are also seen those in helpless condition.225.
The warriors are challenging and are consciously striking blows.226.
The warriors of Shiraz sat down after feeling shy.227.
Kalki inspires them to get up and cause them to see, he revolves the sword and strikes its edge.228.
KRAPAAN KRAT STANZA
Where the warriors are fighting and the arrows are being discharged, there the warriors get up and their armours, being shattered are falling down.229.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਆਕਾਸ਼ ਵਿਚ ਹੂਰਾਂ ਘੁੰਮ ਰਹੀਆਂ ਹਨ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The warriors falling down in the war-arena are ferrying across the ocean of fear and the heavenly damsels roaming in the sky, are wedding the warriors.230.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਸ੍ਰੇਸ਼ਠ ਸੂਰਮਿਆਂ ਨੂੰ ਵਿਆਹ ਰਹੀਆਂ ਹਨ ॥੨੩੦॥
ਰਣ-ਭੂਮੀ ਵਿਚ ਮਾਰੂ ਨਾਦ ਵਜ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ
(ਜਿਸ ਨੂੰ) ਸੁਣ ਕੇ ਕਾਇਰ ਭਜ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Listening to the musical instruments of the battlefield, the cowards are running away and abandoning the battlefield, they are feeling shy.231.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਮਨ ਵਿਚ ਸ਼ਰਮ ਮਹਿਸੂਸ ਕਰ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ ॥੨੩੧॥
ਰਣ ਵਿਚ ਜੂਝ ਕੇ ਮਰਦੇ ਹਨ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The warriors are again rotating and embracing death by fighting, they do not retrace even one step from the battlefield and are ferrying across the dreadful ocean of Samsara by dying.232.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਯੁੱਧ ਦੇ ਰੰਗ ਵਿਚ ਮਚੇ ਹੋਏ ਹਨ।
ਚਤੁਰੰਗਨੀ ਸੈਨਾ ਘਾਇਲ ਹੋ ਰਹੀ ਹੈ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: In the dreadful war, the fourfold army was scattered into fragments and because of the infliction of wounds on the bodies of the warriors, their honour and respect declined.233.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਮਨ ਵਿਚੋਂ ਹੰਕਾਰ ਘਟ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ ॥੨੩੩॥
ਜ਼ਰਾ ਜਿੰਨੇ ਵੀ ਪਿਛੇ ਨਹੀਂ ਹਟਦੇ।
ਜਦੋਂ (ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦਾ) ਚਿਤ ਚਿੜ੍ਹ ਜਾਂਦਾ ਹੈ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Without retracing their steps even slightly, the warriors are fighting and in anger, they are besieging the army.234.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਤਾਂ ਉਠ ਕੇ ਸੈਨਾ ਨੂੰ ਘੇਰ ਲੈਂਦੇ ਹਨ ॥੨੩੪॥
ਦੇਵ ਇਸਤਰੀਆਂ (ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਨੂੰ) ਵਿਆਹ ਰਹੀਆਂ ਹਨ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: They fall down on the earth after dying and the women of gods are wedding them, the warriors getting enraged in their mind, do not retrace even one step.235.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਕ੍ਰੋਧਵਾਨ ਹੋ ਕੇ ਯੁੱਧ ਕਰਦੇ ਹਨ।
ਦੋ ਕਦਮ ਵੀ ਪਿਛੇ ਨਹੀਂ ਹਟਦੇ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Getting infuriated, the warriors do not run for two steps and fighting in anger, they fall on the ground.236.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਅੰਤ ਵਿਚ ਮਾਰੇ ਜਾ ਕੇ) ਧਰਤੀ ਉਤੇ ਡਿਗ ਪੈਂਦੇ ਹਨ ॥੨੩੬॥
(ਜਿਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦੀ ਧੁਨ ਨੂੰ) ਸੁਣ ਕੇ ਬਦਲ ਸ਼ਰਮਿੰਦੇ ਹੁੰਦੇ ਹਨ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Because of the sound of the musical instruments of the battlefield the clouds are feeling shy and the bedecked warriors are not retracing, even slightly.237.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਦੋ ਕਦਮ ਵੀ (ਪਿਛੇ ਨੂੰ) ਨਹੀਂ ਭਜਦੇ ॥੨੩੭॥
(ਜਿਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦੀ ਲਿਸ਼ਕ) ਪ੍ਰਕਾਸ਼ ('ਦੁਤਿ') ਦੇ ਮਾਣ ਨੂੰ ਵੀ ਨੀਵਾਂ ਵਿਖਾ ਦਿੰਦੀ ਹੈ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The striking discs are shattering the glory and pride of the warriors, because of the dreadfulness of war, the Sumeru mountain has also trembled and the steam of the blood of the warriors is flowing.238.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਸੂਰਮੇ ਲਹੂ ਨਾਲ ਲਥ ਪਥ ਹਨ ॥੨੩੮॥
ਯੁੱਧ ਦਾ ਰੰਗ ਜੰਮ ਜਾਂਦਾ ਹੈ।
(ਸੂਰਮੇ) ਰਣ ਵਿਚ ਖੰਭੇ (ਵਾਂਗ) ਗਡੇ ਜਾ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The dreadful war is going on with terrible explosions and the horse-riders are fixing their columns of victory.239.
Holding their swords in fury, the warriors are fighting and fighting with the strength of their mind, they are not moving back.240.
